title: Chasing Shadows: The Troubled and Haunted
description: The prophesies of the past predicted the future. From the desperation for a male child necessitated the several pains Augustina had to put up with her overbearing father. A loving heart that cares no matter the odds. Then comes all the troubled and haunted ex-president Illuminant and ghost of the past.
author: Blessing Ikokwu-Oruche
